task.title: Unbundle an Image
task.shortdesc: Eucalyptus provides the euca-unbundle command for unbundling a previously bundled image.

context.p: If you wish to share a previously bundled image with another user, you must first unbundle the image, then bundle, upload, and register the image again with the other userâ€™s credentials.

example.p: The following example shows the unbundling of the bundled image file referenced by the manifest file centos.5-3.x86-64.img.manifest.xml:
